title: Sideline 2015 Week 8 headed to UC vs. Cedar Creek
text:

Post to Facebook Sideline 2015 Week 8 headed to UC vs. Cedar Creek Week Eight of Sideline 2015 and the First Coast Sports team is headed to the Southside as the No. 1 ranked University Christian Christians play host to the Cedar Creek Christian Saints.   firstcoastnews.com: http://fcnews.tv/1LwKBQm   Join the Conversation To   Sideline 2015 Week 8 headed to UC vs. Cedar Creek Tim Bee, sports reporter 12:09 a.m. EDT October 16, 2015 Week Eight of Sideline 2015 and the First Coast Sports team is headed to the Southside as the No. 1 ranked University Christian Christians play host to the Cedar Creek Christian Saints. (Photo: Team Sideline) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
JACKSONVILLE, Fla. - Week Eight of Sideline 2015 and the First Coast Sports team is headed to the Southside as the No. 1 ranked University Christian Christians play host to the Cedar Creek Christian Saints. 
This game features a pair of 5-1 teams. UC, the top team in Class 2A, boasts arguably the best backfield on the First Coast with Hussien Howe and Otis Anderson Jr. The two have combined for almost 1,500 rushing yards and 26 rushing touchdowns through just six games. 
Cedar Creek has confidence though. The Saints are riding a five-game winning streak, the longest in school history, and they believe they have what it takes to defeat the Christians. 
There will be plenty of action in this one but if this game doesn't do it for you have no fear because the First Coast Sports team will have our cameras all throughout the First Coast catching all of the action. 
Don't forget to turn into Sideline 2015, Friday night at 11:15 p.m. on FCN. High school sports guru Justin Barney breaks down the Sideline 2015 Week 8 Games to Watch. WTLV Sideline 2015 Week 8 Forecast WTLV
